name: Matar Paneer

ingredients.name: Ginger (Ada)
ingredients.quantity: 1 inch ground to a fine paste

steps: Heat mustard oil in a frying pan.
Add the paneer cubes, fry lightly and keep aside.
Add onions and fry till golden brown.
Add ginger paste, cumin powder, turmeric powder, tomatoes, chillie powder, salt and sugar.
Fry the mixture till oil seperates from the masala.
Add green peas and stirfry for 2 minutes.
Add water, cover pan with a lid and cook for 10 minutes.
Add paneer and boil for 5 minutes till the green peas are tender.
Add wheat flour, pure ghee, garam masala and cook for 2 minutes, stirring continuously.
Your Matar Paneer is ready... Serve it hot.
